title: Library Management System
description: A library management software where admin can add/view/delete librarian and librarian can add/view books, issue, view issued books and return books.

title: Hotel Management System
description: Develop a Hotel Management System web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to streamline reservations, guest services, and administrative tasks.

title: Porfolio Website
description: Dynamic portfolio showcasing innovative projects, built using React for front-end interactivity and Express/Node for robust back-end functionality.

title: ECommerce Website
description: Design a modern eCommerce website UI in Figma with intuitive navigation, visually appealing product displays, and user-friendly checkout process for enhanced shopping experience.

title: Banking Management System
description: Developed a comprehensive Banking Management System in Java with Swing GUI for efficient and user-friendly banking operations and transactions.

title: Youtube Clone
description: Create a YouTube clone leveraging React, Express, and Node.js, combining dynamic front-end features with a robust back-end infrastructure for seamless video sharing and viewing experience.
